comments.html:
I used to use Libnet API for network programming in late 90s early 00s from packetfactory.net APIs are important/helpful unless you want to do some ASAM;)

For some opensource utilities and tools you will see some libnet related components.
For those interested.
http://packetfactory.openwall.net/projects/libnet/index.html
comments.name: jsicuran

comments.html: I've been playing around a bit and the RESTClient plugin for Firefox pointing at a couple of test VMs (couple of Riverbed load balancers in this case) has been an exercise I've found useful for starting off with.
comments.name: PaulH
